subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] banning spam
msgSnippet: The only way to deal with it is to change the group settings so that no new subscriber may post without moderation or even join without approval [or both]. Of
messageBody:
The only way to deal with it is to change the group settings so that no
new subscriber may post without moderation or even join without approval
[or both]. Of course it still won't stop 'em stealing email addresses ....

-Andii

Paige Gabhart wrote:
> Dear Suebee:
>
> The Interest-rate spammer has been banned! I fear this may become like
> the boy trying to hold back the ocean with his finger in the dike. It
> would be satisfying if spammers were to be hit with significant
> penalties such as large fines for screwing up the utility of the
> internet. They're like a plague of locusts in their fecundity.
>
>
> Paige Gabhart
